summary: Provides the workflow for ingesting bibliographic data into the Open Library catalog, validating and normalizing input, linking or creating edition and work records, importing author details, handling cover images and Internet Archive items, and offering helper utilities for searching, author name handling, language validation, and URL resolution.
business_intent: To expand and maintain a highâ€‘quality, searchable collection of books in Open Library by automating the addition of new records while preventing duplicates and ensuring consistent metadata.
